data: EXL invests in Corridor Platforms – a big data credit risk management platform

top of page

Skip to Main Content

# Insights

ExlService is a leading operations management and analytics company. EXL offers insurance, banking, financial services, utilities, healthcare, travel, transportation and logistics services.

[EXL invests in Corridor Platforms – a big data credit risk management platform.](https://www.globenewswire.com/news-release/2018/02/27/1395727/0/en/EXL-invests-in-Corridor-Platforms-a-big-data-credit-risk-management-platform.html)
